name: NGS course
tagline: Three days course about NGS data analysis
body:
NGS Data Analysis Course
================================================================================

-----

### Introduction to NGS technologies

### Quality control for NGS raw data

### Mapping reads to a reference genome
- [Slides](Course_Materials/alignment/presentation/ngs-read-mapping-imedina-mda14.pdf) - [Practical exercise](http://ngscourse.github.io/Course_Materials/alignment/tutorial/example.html)

### Variant calling

### Variant annotation

- [Slides](Course_Materials/variant_annotation/presentation/2014-Cambridge_variant_annotation.pdf) || [Practical exercise 1](Course_Materials/variant_annotation/tutorial/010_example.html)
